meanings.definition: A frozen dessert made from thickened milk, sugar, and flavorings.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious kulfis after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The street vendor sold various flavors of kulfis.
meanings.sent3: The kulfis were so cold, they made my teeth chatter!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and refreshing as a kulfis on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The kulfis melted in my mouth, leaving a creamy sensation.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two kulfis for dessert.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed different types of kulfis.
meanings.sent3: The kulfis in the freezer were having a party!
meanings.sent4: The kulfis on the plate looked like a mini army ready to be devoured.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the kulfis filled the room, tempting everyone to try a bite.
